content.detailedDescription: on a bright sunny summer afternoon in 1986, while at 6,500 feet in my grumman aa1b and on port columbus international radar ohio, i got permission to vector over to a huge sphere about the diameter of half a football field that was not showing on their radar. it was only about 5 miles from them and hovering behind a cloud at 5,000 feet. i collided with the sphere and sustained damage to the outer third of my left wing. what i saw breaking across the leading edge of my wing were perfectly shaped 5 or 6 sided crystals about 4 to 5 inches long that were pointed on both ends. there were millions of them all spaced equally from each other and not moving in any fashion. as i approached the sphere it looked incredibly bright like a second sun but then as i collided with it the light went instantly out and i realized that the light was a reflection of the sun above deflecting through the crystals. these crystals were not ice. the collision caused so much drag on my left wing that it caused my plane to flip counter-clockwise and almost cartwheel. to this day i am the only pilot that i know of that has intentionally collided with a ufo and lived. also to this day, i havent found any way that the sun could possibly have deflected off those crystals at the angle they were all positioned given the sun was almost directly overhead and i was approaching from above. i landed immediately to asses the damage to my wing.
content.summary: Inflight collision with ufo crystal sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was watching cnn showing mars in 3-d on jan. 23,2004 and as the rover pannedthe depression-like area, a white object appeared and flew toward the lander,changing directions three times not just straight, but zig-zagand as the objectturned toward the right and passed in front of the lander, we could see itsshape as missle-like,with three distinct round modules on it one at either endand one in the middle.  the object was white and at the normal speed of thevideo , moved so fast that it was hardly noticable with eye as it moved acrossthe screen .  wnen freeze-framed and advanced a frame at a time, it could beclearly seen. when the point of origin was retraced, it appeared to have emergedfron a dark looking opening at the opposite wall of the crater-like depressiononly yards from the rover lander. as the object passed swoopedby the lander, we could see the whole shape and a dark area under the centermodule on the body of the object. the object turned as it passed by the lander,and did almost 180 turn in a very short area before it disappeared from thescreen. at regular video speed, one would have to be very observant to even seeit-it was moving that fast curiosity as to the white blip that i caught moving,was what prompted me to check it out. i have seen terrestial ufos, before , andhave most of the books and videos on the subject. this is different, in that icant give you certain pertanent information because this is not earth-based. icontacted jpl and cnn, but received no reply.  probably think im another kook ifit means anything, im a minister and have absolutely no reson to lie ordeceive--im only reporting what i saw and my wife and actually two other peoplesaw and can verify. so, if youre interested, please feel free to contact me, asi would like to get the tape analysed for accuracy.  sincerely, lewie
content.summary: A white cylindrical object with three round module

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2030, my wife, who was seated upon the living room couch of ourfourth floor apartment, saw a bright light shining through a crack in the closedblinds, through the bedroom window. both my wife and myself went to the bedroomwindow to open the blinds and get a better look at the light in the western sky.Once i realized that i was, occasionally, witnessing yellow and blue lights, andmy wife was viewing orange-yellow, white and blue lights, in some type ofirregular pattern, along with the primary colored light, which was red, i videotaped the lights through the bedroom window, which has an unmatchable screen onits outside.After a couple of minutes of attempting to video tape the unidentified lightsthrough the veil of the screen, i dressed for the outside weather, ran down fourstories of stairs and went to a street corner, a short distance to the north andvideo-taped the only lights in the entire night sky.At first, i thought that the red light might be the planet, mars. then, i sawother lights shining in the area adjacent to the light, and i realized that itcouldnt be the planet, mars. then, i questioned myself as to whether it could bea plane. but, beside the fact that my wife and i, in four years of living in thevery same apartment, have never seen a plane follow that kind of flight patternat night, the lights were glowing much too brilliantly at the distance, between1.000 and 1600 meters from our position, the lights were positioned in the couldcovered sky. in fact, even when a plane has flown directly overhead, at analtitude of 1,000 feet, at night, i have never witnessed any plane light thatwas as bright as the lights i videotaped in that western sky.At times, the lights seemed to hover for a minute or so. then, it would, veryslowly, continue on in its westward journey, once more.After about ten or eleven minutes of the light show, i went back into theapartment. then, after a minute of conversing with my wife, i looked out thebedroom window, and the lights had vanished and did not reappear.
content.summary: Unidentified red, blue, white and yellow lights in

content.detailedDescription: I sent you my original report that i did at the day after the event many thingsyou asked me in this report above i couldnb4t write because it was a sigular eventand ib4m going to try to translate as you asked me. first of all the second witnesshe was my sergeant patrol and he was at the back side of the station and hereported me about the animals excitement the cows was running, and the dogs wasbarking in a very stress way. i know he lives in pelotas city but i donb4t know his adress. now let me translate the report i wrote to my commander inoficer i inform you that on my duty in october 11 2000 at 2255 apeared in overthe our station an ufo with size aproximation 250m diameter and gave out a soundlike a swarm. it has lights purple and from the hole in the center of the objecta white light. friends i asked you to try a person in your city to translate theother par of my report because here is almost midnight and ib4m very tired and ib4m going to sleep now or than you call me tomorrow there are many people nowask me to translate ill be glad to do it another day thank you for yourunderstanding my situation. there are many tecnical english about the things ihad to do in that day and i have to do it with very responsability for you geteverything. good night see you.
content.summary: Alien invasion.
content.locationName: Rio Grande, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription: I am searching for a real life device similiar to to one in the moviestargate where the actor james spader places a women in the device,and is healed from a fatal wound. i have dveloped several unpleasenthealth problems as a result of two auto accidents and an o.D.Amoungother things . i wish to be placed in such a device to restore me tohealth thank you. i have asked this question before i need an answer.Thank you
content.summary: I need help

content.detailedDescription: Object spotted by frances hooper first my motheras we sat in our livingroom...Across the road and down slightly is a strand of tall tall pinetrees...She saw a flash which drew her attention and she yelled at me...I justhad to turn slightly in my chair to look out a window and saw a large fire redoblong object floating downward thru the trees...About a mile or so directlybehind the trees is a rather good sized lake...I did have time to move from theliving room into a bedroom and watch it for a few seconds..Before going backinto the living room and opening the front door as the object disappeard fromsight..I had turned the sound off the tv and could hear no soundwhatsoever...Which told me it couldnt be an airplane in distress..I did call ourlocal police depart. just in case it was a plane in some trouble that had gonedown on the iced over lake...An officer did come to the house...He saw nothingon the lake, but said the dispatcher had called bangor me intl airport and themanchester nh intl airport to see if any planes had disappeard off radar...Whenhe questioned me he asked me if i had ever seen a shooting star...Which ihave..And when he asked me what size it looked like...From where i was it wasthe size of his cruiser...He looked rather surprised and commented that it thathad been a meteorite and had hit  someone would have felt it...This isnt thefirst time i and my mother have seen strange lights during the winter....Butthis is the biggest and the brightest...Just wondering if anyone else in nh sawanthing
content.summary: Red firey object

content.detailedDescription: students and i were at billings logan international airport building our  airplane when we noticed a very bright pulsating light in the sw at about a 30  degree angle above the horizon.  date was january 31, 2004 at 1800 hours.   looked like an aircraft on long final but all traffic that night was right  base and this light hovered for 25 minutes over the western part of billings  and then vanished after 25 minutes. initially thought it may be an aircraft  bucking a strong headwind but winds were calm.  object did move 5 degrees  diagonaly to our right but then moved 5 degrees back to the left.  estimated  altitude was 7000-8000 agl at a distance of 9 miles.  size and shape was  indeterminable but light was very bright such as a landing light and the light  pulsed with a faint blue tint.
content.summary: Bright pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I had gone out for a walk to a place in runcorn called norton priory just toclear my head.  i had been at an away day with halton ymca what is more a friendhad said something about a former member of staff that i an found of that hadupset me.  that is why i wanted to clear my head.  when i had got up to nortonpriory i went up to the wall garden end.  part of the wall garden area is calledkittys gate and it backs onto one of the faxtorys on the maner park industrialarea of runcorn.  there is a hole in the fense at witch point went throught itabd looked to my left.  that is when i saw the lights.  they gave of no sound atall.  they seemed to be move above the river mersey and heading in the directionof the siver jubiley bridge.  the reson i lost sight of them is that tere weresome trees and buildings in the way.  the video that i am on about in the formis video footige the was showen on bbc north west tonight a few weeks before ofthem flying over the speak area of liverpool.  in that footege they were headingfor the river mersey.  so that is why i reconised them as some sort of ufo likecrft.  the only reson i have filled in the provens part is the setup would notlet me send this with that part blank.
content.summary: Flook of lights.

content.summary: Several1993-present

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from a site survey which was a reported landing of a ufosome 15 years ago. i photographed the site so i had my camera. i was approachingmy home when i saw the dark oval object near my home in the sky. it was large,oval, blackish and hovering. i snapped one photo from the road and hurried hometo try to get a video camera and get footage of the object. this was 2 minuteslater and the object was gone .  i am kim shaffer asst.State director tennesseemufon and a cert. field investigator.
content.summary: Dark object photographed

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were camping on the columbia river on or near the hanfordnuclear site,it was just before dawn when the sky starts to light up but the sunhasnt rose yet,and we both had been up talking all night. we had just put outour fire and we were about to go to our tents to sleep when we both noticed somelights on the horizon to the north. i at first thought they were lights from abunch of radio towers, but my brother ,acea ,who lived in the areasaid theycouldnt be,that there werent any radio stations that close.Then we saw that theywere all getting brighter which meant they must be getting coser,so at thatpoint we decided they must be hellicopters.They were moving fast and comingdirectly towards us.Then they did some kind of aireal formation changesaccrobatics,by this time they were almost on top of us. the manuvers that theyhad just done  were impossible i thought for any hellicopters to do ,and thelast thing i remember was screaming at my brother those arent hellicopters,runas iwe ran towards the riverbank where there was some brush growing to hideunder. the next thing i remembered was waking up about 200 yards easl of ourcamp .We were just laying on the sand in the hot sun. it was approxamately 3 to4 pm. we just got up and started walking back to my moms where acea lived at thetime.Approx. a quarter mile i was thirsty and faigued.Iwas also somewhat dazed.We had our mom go get our camping gear later that evening. we never even said aword to eaachother or anyone else about the strange and frightening events thatmorning until 5 years later .I was watching sightingsat home in lynnwoodwashington and on it they showed a video clip of some lights on the horizon, andjust like a lightbulb turning on i all of a sudden remembered seeing somthingvery similar along time ago,i wasnt sure if what i was remembering was just adream i had had or if it really happened so i phoned my brother in benton cityand asked h
content.summary: Saw strange lights and lost memory

content.detailedDescription: First of all, im spanish and ib4ll try to do my best speaking in english.We were waiting for santi, the 4th witness. i was lying on the street, lookingat the sky, something i love doing. then i realized that two starts wereshaking, i told my 2 friends, but we agreed it could be an optical effect. after3 minutes looking at it, the two starts started to move, getting close and,inmediatly 0,0001 seconds, getting far, and again, close, far, close, far.....After 20 seconds doing that, they continued doing that movement, but this timethe also move forward. then our friend santi came, and saw another one who wasmoving from south to east. when we thought it was going to conitnue, it cameback 180ba movement, crossed between us and the other 2 starts, and joined into a groupof clouds who were in the south. the, the other 2 stars followed this one. wedidnt see anymore. there wasnt any noise, but they were flying too fast ive seenmany planes in the same place, and these were at least 5 or even much faster
content.summary: 3 fast starts doing impossible movements in the se

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 1 30 am and saw a red orange light in thehorizon. once i got to the top of the newport bridge it was completly gone.
content.summary: Red lights path behind or infront of it.

content.detailedDescription: I worked at a department store in w.St.Paul.  i didnt have a car, so my dad wasdriving me home when the sighting occurred.  it was about 200 a.M. or a littleearlier.  i cant recall the exact date.  i know it was before christmas becausewe worked unusually late due to the season.  we drove east on 55th street, thenturned south onto cahill.  we noticed bright lights like daylight shining intoour car.  i commented to my dad that these street lights were really bright.  ilooked out the window to look at the street lights and i saw the bottom of thishuge oval shaped craft. it was quiet and floating about 200 feet above ground. i asked my dad what it was.  he said he didnt know.  i looked at the undersideof it for any airforce or military markings.  i commented to dad that i hope itsnot a russian spy blimp.  there werent any markings like a tail number.  wediscussed that it could be a ufo, and laughed about the odds of us seeing a ufo. lights were shining down from the bottom of it, almost like  search lights, butthey illuminated the entire area under it.  when it passed over our car, itseemed like we were in the dark even though there were street lights.  i watchedit continue to float northwest and i noticed how bright the ground below it wasilluminated. it disappeared over the horizon we were at the bottom of a hill soit went out of sight  i think our radio stopped when we were under the thing. we were waiting to hear the news about what we had just seen and i recall dadpunching different stations trying to find news.  we concluded that it was somesort of experimental military craft, but that was over 20 years ago, and ivenever heard anything more about it.  its hard to recall exactly what it lookedlike because it was so long ago.  i am quite clear about the bright lightsshining down on us and that it was huge -- probably 4 football fields.  when itold a friend about it, she made fun of me, so i have kept quiet about it.  dadand i havent discussed it for years other than when we decided it was probably asecret military aircraft. did anyone else see it  id like to remain anonymousand keep this private, but im really curious to see if anyone else saw this. ive never seen anything like it before or since then.
content.summary: Lighter than air craft in igh, mn

content.detailedDescription: This is a photo on the mount st. helens volcanic monument web site.Please lookat it. every one iknow whos seen it are amazed. you may want to copy theseinstructions. 1. go to the mount st. helens volcanic monument web site. 2. onleft side of page find and click photo gallery. 3. at top right click photo pagethen click entire photo index 109 photos. then get photos. 4. scroll down to 23and click hi res photo then enlarge again.If by some miricle you made, you willsee the two objects, one at the top and the other almost at the bottom.
content.summary: Mount st. helens ufos

content.detailedDescription: My ex-girlfriend and i have seen several totaly differnt objects. these sitingshave made me a very strong beleiver in ufos. i have seen close 20 ufos. one ofmy sitings i was driving through the small town of linville and was going to theparkway to take my girlfriend to her house in linville falls community. beforewe got out of linville we seen what appeared to be lighting towards the parkway.So i said to my girlfriend lets see if we can see the lighting from a littlecloser. the closer we got the more we noticed it was not lighting,and started uptowards it. the closer i got to it i noticed that it appeard to be resting veryclose to a radio tower. anyway i pulled over on a pull off and put my truck inpark and watched for a few seconds and then got a strange filling that i wantedto get out for a second,and told my girlfriend and by then she was prettyfreaked out already,because we could both tell it was closer to the road thanthe tower that sits there.So when i go to get out she gets terriorfied andstarts to pull my so i couldnt get out,and starts insisting we leave so eventhough i wanted to explore around for more evidence i pulled out with her aboutto start crying from fear. we passed a black van that stoped where we wereat,and we made it home fine. the reason we seen the flashes like lighting wasbecause it was very foggy the lights on the object never flashed in the samepattern. and was flashing purple. the next day as i drove though the same area inoticed a big heathly tree had been twisted around like i have never seen beforesplinters were sticking out every where. you dont have to believe me but i knowwhat i have seen with my own eyes. and i believe theres something out there justas interested in us just the same as we are interested in them. and ive seenmore and have a good idea on where to film lites that are unexplanable to me.
content.summary: I have seen some very strange things in avery coun

content.detailedDescription: In a taxi on the way home from a party, saw lights rotating in the sky, thoughtit was a plane at first but it was going too fast and moving along like it wastumbling over in the sky like a cartwheel. only lasted a couple of seconds, andthen it was fone from viewseen in north walesukclwydian mountain range24th jan 2004
content.summary: Saw lights rotating in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Hello,i was driving south bound on krome avenue, between sw 8th street and sw 88thstreet, i have been always interested in unknow things so i always keep lookingaround specially up in the sky, so i looked up to a airplane flying from northto south, which is odd, since they usually fly east and west, so as i looked atthis airplane i noticed something else about 100 feet higher than the airplaneflying from the se to the nw above the airplane, at first i tought it wasanother airplane, but then i noticed that it had no wings, tail or tail wings,it was silver just like a airplane, but it was shinning in an unusual manner,since it was around 5.30pm, the sun was almost down on the horizon at the west,now the airplane flying from north to south was reflecting the sun on the rightside perfectly, but this object was flying from se to nw, so it will not be ableto reflect the sun as if the sun was 90 degrees from it, like it did, it seemedlike glowing brightly with a silver color, like i have stated at the beggining,i also carry a camera and binoculars with me at all times, so i decide i had topull over for good look, so as i drove for about 4 minutes, i keep looking atthis object hover right on top of the road, but it was getting behind me as ikeep going south, so i looked for a place to stop, since this is a one line roadyou can not just stop, so i got to the cement factory entrance, pulled over andgot out of my car with my binoculars..., it was gone, with no sign of itanywhere in the sky, it took less than 30 seconds since i saw it for the lasttime until i got out of the car and looked again, the object was a cigar-shapedbrightly glowing metallic silver, no noise, no windows, no apparent propulsionsystem, just floating there about 90 degrees from the horizon right on top ofthe road, it could not have been a airplane, or i will have seen it fly away,and not dissapear into thin air....Also it seemed to close to the other airplane, i do not think airplanes areallowed to fly about 100 feet from each other...
content.summary: Cigar-shaped object hovering on top of krome avenu

content.detailedDescription: I live ct i was visiting my sister on the weekend of 15c185c04. that day7b18th jan7dmy birthday .I was returning home with my wife, as we came close to tappen zeebridge on the nj side of bridge we see this ball of fire falling from the sky,mywife then ask me if i see that ball of fire i told her maybe its a plaincrashing we where about a 12 mile from the bridge at this point, my wife wassort of scared,i just try to get closer to bridge as fast as i could then welost sight of it,i was expecting to see some sort off explosion but nothinghappend.As we were driving on bridge we kept looking to our right this is werethis ball of fire seemed to have fallen in the river or close to shore line butwe didnt see no fire nothing.As i was paying bridge toll i ask the toll personif he seen a plain crash he said no.As we were driving home the rest of the waymy wife was sort off freaked out,not crazy freaked out but seemed scared thatmaybe it was a plain crash and people died.As for me i called my brother injersey that same night and told him what happened he told me he would bechecking the news to see if there was a plain crash but he called me a few dayslater and said there was nothing on the news i also watched for news of a plaincrash but nothing i dont no what this ball of fire was but it was the strangesthing i ever so. thank you ps maybe someone else seen this, there were more carsthat night.
content.summary: Ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: I realize this has taken a little while to subit and may not be worthinvestigating but am sure of what i observed.I was working the night shift andhad stepped outside for a breath of fresh air.The facility where i worked at wasqueit a large complex on the chattahoochee river in the jones bridge park areaof city mentioned above.It was a clear morning and there were stars in thesky,but these 2 pinpoints of light appeared out of the east traveling at a highspeed and vanished.Approximatly one minute later they reappeared from samedirection and again vanished.I did not see them again but shortly afterwardapproximatly 3 minutes,i observed an aircraft,flying paralell in the oppositedirection of where objector objects,the lights were in perfect formation so itwas difficult to tell if they were 2 or 1appeared.I found this to be strange forthe reason that this occured shortly after the sept 11 skyjackings and allgeneral and commercial aviation flights were put on hold at that time and alsothe high speed and perfect precision these objects flew.Again this may benothing due to the time i took to tell about it and there may be a perfectlylogical explaination for it ,but thought it may be interesting.Thanks for yourtime.
content.summary: This appeared to be the triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Soil_samplessubmittedvegetation_samplesacquiredwe were outside and snowboarding then we saw a object hovering above the treesabout 100 feet. then it went straight and dissappered in the night then we wereall freked then seen small little white lightsphotographicstill_photoaudiocassetteradar_trackdisappeared_graduallytraceotherwitness1_identityalfredwitness1_phone

content.detailedDescription: Relaxing in the hot tub on back deck south side of house looking up counting aircraft when this object streaked from zenith to the southern horizion almost due north to south aproximately 1 to 1  half seconds to disappearance  at aprox 45 degrees no sound milky white glow maybe a short trail but that might have been due to eye presistance thought first meteor but never saw a meteor travel due south and white mist in color approx time was 2015 est todays date  1232004 unable to enter 2004 in the first box i have approximately 7 high altitude air routes that cross over near my location  evansville, indiana 8 miles west of red bank road on highway 62 and then 1  half miles north
content.summary: Milky object traveling from north to south

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to bed at 300 a.M. on december 24 when i looked out my bedroomspicture window facing south.  there were no lights on in the room or the rest ofthe house.  to give a location reference, a major east-west highway the onceheavily-traveled hwy 66 but known in the city limits as n.W. 39th expresswayisfive streets south of us our house is on n.W. 44, and we are just east of themajor north-south thoroughfare of portland ave in okc.  a strip mall located onthe corner of 39th  portland and several motels and businesses up  down 39thhave lighting bright enough that the sky always seems light looking south fromour house.   i invariably look out the window on the south side of our bedroomthat overlooks the back yard.  currently, there is no shade nor window covering,so the view is good both of the sky and of the houses located on treadwell st.That back up to our lot.  im not sure what made me look up to my right, but wheni did was in a state of wonderment at this unique phenomenon i observed.It was high in the sw sky and i thought at first it might be a starconstellation, since it was far too large to be a single star.  but then itappeared to be too close to be any kind of star and did not have the shiningbrightness of a star.  it was distinct, though, in appearance from the darkerblue of the sky around it.  i could see other stars in the sky, but they seemedto be at a much greater distance.  whether i observed the bottom of something orthe side, i cannot tell.  there was what appeared to be a pale aqua band aroundthe edge of the entire object and the sides were not straight but rather curved. it seemed to be quite high but was large enough to be easily seen by the nakedeye.  there was no movement.  it did not move the entire time i observedit--approximately 30 minutes.  several lights or sources of light could be seenwithin it, but they seemed to be coming from several crevices located in atleast two places on either side toward the upper edge.  when i use the termcrevice, i mean an area with a deep indentation like a trench with areas oferosion or less-deep indentations raying out almost like the rays from a starbut not as random, since the center indentation was longer than the ones comingout from the sides.  whether these lights pulsed or not, i could not tell butthey seemed to be muffled or glowing in a nebulous way as though there wereclouds  that covered the sources of light.  the object seemed almost transparentor translucent, really quite beautiful  unlike anything id seen before.  if ihad to compare
content.summary: Unknown object seen in sky on 122403 in oklahoma c

content.detailedDescription: Flemingburg, kentuckyi live in a rural area which is usually very dark.  i was going to the garageand i exited my house via a southward facing door.  as soon as i steppedoutside, i saw a very bright light in the distance above the treeline in theneighboring field.  the light was very bright white and seemed to pulse.  atfirst i thought it might be a dirt bike headlight or some such thing on the hilltop.  so i stopped to see what might be going on, since it is usually quiet atnight.  after my eyes had a few minutes to adjust to the darkness, it becomeclear that the light was quite a bit above the treeline and definately not onthe hill top.  you could see the night sky clearly underneath it.  the hill topis about 500-600 feet in the distance, with trees at the top that are abour 30feet tall.  the hill top is about a 50-75 foot increase in elevation from thelocation of my house.  after realizing that it wasnt a bike, i thought it mightbe a hovering helicopter.I watched the light for two or three minutes.  every once in a while, it wouldwobble from side to side very quickly if it were a penny in my hand at armslength, it would be a 12 movement in each direction and return to its originalposition.  also, it would occasionally flare.  it would go from a dime sizedcircle of light and then flare to the size of something slightly larger than apenny.  when it flared, the light got brighter and whiter.  then immediatelyafter a flare, the light would become a blue-white color.  i watched for about3-4 minutes, but it got very cold, so i went inside to put more clothes on.I went back outside about 1-2 minutes later and it was still in the exact sameplace doing the exact same thing.  i went into the garage and came back out afew minutes later because i was curious as what the light might be.  afterstudying it, i put its distance from me at about 2-3 miles.This is also when i became aware that something out of the ordinary was goingon.  on a normal day, if i stood around outside all day and all night, i mightsee two planes pass overhead.  well when i came out of the garage, i saw theblinking red lights of planes above.  at first, i noticed one coming towards mefrom the ne.  the looking around the sky some more, i spotted two comingwest-nw.  after a few minutes of scanning the sky, i found the red blink lightsof 5 planes moving towards the objecttwo ne, two west-nw, and one from the south.  as the nw and ne planesapproached, i could hear the distinct roar of jet engines.  i couldnt tell whatkind, but they were definately jets.  these five jets began to make a widecircular path around the obje
content.summary: Hovering, pulsing light in the distance with jets

content.detailedDescription: 1 walking dog at night 2 extreme brightness 3 planet 4 curiosity 5 object just disappeared other night - still there now 6 went in side and came back to check if it was there have seen object 3 times.  similar report from someone claiming it was above jefferson proving grounds near madison in on national ufo reporting center webpage
content.summary: Bright light in sw sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw the coolest thing in the sky - it looked like two shooting stars moving atthe exact same speed in the exact same direction.  it took place around 7 pm onjanuary 22,2004.  the location in the sky was around the orion constellation. ifirst noticed them around the belt and the drifted slowly out of site.I firstnoticed them at the top of the sky and the moved down toward the horizon.  i amabout 5 minutes from n e philadelphia and maybe 25 - 30 minutes from center cityphiladelphia. i have seen shooting stars before but never have i seen 2 at thesame time moving at the same speed in the same direction. do i think it was aufo i doubt it but who knows  maybe someone else saw it.  any how it was areally cool thing to see.
content.summary: Shooting stars

content.detailedDescription: We saw flying things
